 Be the first one to add a plot.

imdb.plot outline: Late Night at the Plaza is a comedic and eclectic talk show that showcases a collection of national talent encompassing everything from the host's week to week bits, to stand up comedy, gorgeous dance numbers, and everything in between - all put together on one stage, live, bi-weekly, with an 80 minute run time, all at the Plaza Theater in Calgary, Alberta. After a half decade (5 seasons) of production, Late Night at the Plaza has garnered a sizeable cult following in Alberta, and looks to continue building on that. Calgary, AB, every other Wednesday night, at the Plaza Theatre.
imdb.title: Late Night at the Plaza
plot: _Late Night at the Plaza_ (qv) is a comedic and eclectic talk show that showcases a collection of national talent encompassing everything from the host's week to week bits, to stand up comedy, gorgeous dance numbers, and everything in between - all put together on one stage, live, bi-weekly, with an 80 minute run time, all at the Plaza Theater in Calgary, Alberta. After a half decade (5 seasons) of production, _Late Night at the Plaza_ (qv) has garnered a sizeable cult following in Alberta, and looks to continue building on that.
